attributes.action: Reinstate practical and theory tests for key workers during national lockdown
attributes.additional_details: As a result of national lockdown, public transport has been severely reduced. This means that essential key workers, who do not hold a driving licence and are in the process of working towards it, are finding it extremely difficult to fulfil their essential roles. We urge the government to reconsider this; not only will it ensure essential workers can go to work but will also aid in reducing the backlog of people waiting for tests
attributes.background: Reinstate key worker driving and theory tests for key workers to ensure that essential workers are able to travel to work and reduce the ridiculously long DVSA backlog

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566844
